mycolor_button_primary.label: Primary
mycolor_button_primary.info: Main button and "Add to cart" button on product page. Accent color.

mycolor_button_secondary.label: Secondary
mycolor_button_secondary.info: Bordered and transparent background. Accent color.

mycolor_button_product_cart.label: Add to cart
mycolor_button_product_cart.info: "Add to cart" button in collection item. Background color.

mycolor_button_product_cart_icon.label: Add to cart icon
mycolor_button_product_cart_icon.info: "Add to cart" button icon in collection item. Accent color.

mycolor_button_buy_it_now.label: Buy it now
mycolor_button_buy_it_now.info: "Buy it now" button on product page and cart. Base color.

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_button_font.label: Font
type_button_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store.

enable_appearance_effect.label: Enable appearance effect
enable_appearance_effect.info: The option is not displayed in the admin panel, which is convenient when setting up a theme. Enable the option and check on the front.

enable_footer_fixed_effect.label: Enable fixed effect for the footer

open_mini_cart.label: Open mini cart after adding to cart

option_colors.label: Option colors (Filters and variant picker)
option_colors.info: Use the format "color|#FFFFFF" or "color|url" or "option->color|#FFFFFF", and line break as a separator.

paragraph__1.content: Here you may enable up to ten MegaMenu popups. Below are quick steps. For more details [learn more](https://mpithemes.gitbook.io/unicorn-shopify-theme/static-sections/mega-menu) at the documentation.

paragraph__2.content: 1) Enable popup. It will add a Mega Menu section at the theme editor

paragraph__3.content: 2) Set the menu item text to tie the popup

paragraph__4.content: 3) Go to sections and proceed with MegaMenu popup configuration

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

paragraph__1.content: For more details, please check the [Logo settings](https://mpithemes.gitbook.io/unicorn-shopify-theme/theme-settings/logo) at the theme user manual

enable_logo.label: Show picture logo
enable_logo.info: Show the picture logo, or show text if the option is disabled.

paragraph__2.content: You may enable the fullwidth logo at home page header or footer. You may configure it at Theme settings -> Layout -> Sticky header or Sections -> Footer.

animated_logo_width.label: Fullwidth logo width
animated_logo_width.info: 0 - do not limit the width, the logo will stretch to 100%.

options__3.label: In one line, logo and menu left

sticky_header_type.label: Type
sticky_header_type.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up. Logo animation only works if the "Theme settings -> Logo -> Show picture logo" option is enabled. Sticky header and fullwidth logo animation are not animated in the admin panel to streamline the customization process. Check the work of this setting on the preview. Adjust the size of the logo in the section Theme settings -> Logo.

colors.label: Color scheme
colors.has_cards_info: To change the card color scheme, update your theme settings.

button_label.label: Label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Leave the field blank to hide the text.

image_fixed_aspect_ratio.label: Fixed aspect ratio
image_fixed_aspect_ratio.info: 100 - square image. Less than 100 - landscape. More than 100 - portrait. Doesn't work for 'Height = Adapt to image'.

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Leave this field empty if you want to use the button text here.

image_overlay_background_color.label: Image overlay background
image_overlay_background_color.info: Applies only if gradiend option is not set

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location.

map_api_key.label: Google Maps API key
map_api_key.info: You'll need to register a [Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/themes-by-shopify/vintage-themes/customizing-vintage-themes/map-section-api-key) to display the map.

video_description.label: Video alt text
video_description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

image_fixed_aspect_ratio.label: Fixed aspect ratio
image_fixed_aspect_ratio.info: 100 - square image. Less than 100 - landscape. More than 100 - portrait. Doesn't work for 'Height = Adapt to image'.

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your image to be cropped.

color_scheme.label: Color scheme
color_scheme.info: Select image padding to make color visible.

image_overlay_background_color.label: Image overlay background
image_overlay_background_color.info: Applies only if gradiend option is not set

image_fixed_aspect_ratio.label: Fixed aspect ratio
image_fixed_aspect_ratio.info: 100 - square image. Less than 100 - landscape. More than 100 - portrait. Doesn't work for 'Height = Adapt to image'.

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your images to be cropped.

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your image to be cropped.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.info: Video plays in a pop-up if the section contains other blocks.
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your cover image to be cropped.

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your image to be cropped.

image_ratio.label: Image ratio
image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections)

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

image_fixed_aspect_ratio.label: Fixed aspect ratio
image_fixed_aspect_ratio.info: 100 - square image. Less than 100 - landscape. More than 100 - portrait. Doesn't work for 'Height = Adapt to image'.

post_limit.label: Number of blog posts to show

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if blog includes more blog posts than shown

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if collection has more products than shown

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

paragraph__1.content: This block contains text, title and price.

The block shows a countdown to the time set at the "custom.time_countdown" product metafield. [Learn more](https://mpithemes.gitbook.io/unicorn-shopify-theme/page-categories/products/product-information#time-countdown)
Configure options for 'Order in the next XX hours to get it by YY date' block

reset_time.label: Hours of the day to reset delivery countdown

delivery_time.label: Average delivery time of delivery countdown (days)

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

gallery_zoom_scale_coef.label: Gallery zoom scale coefficient on large screens

enable_sticky_info.label: Enable sticky product information on large screens

hide_variants.label: Hide unselected variants’ media on desktop

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Heading required to display the menu.

header__1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

copyright_text.label: Additional copyright text
copyright_text.info: Use the [year] shortcode to add the current year

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky_header.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.

open_onclick.label: Open dropdowns on click instead of hover

link_title.label: Menu item name
link_title.info: Paste a parent link name to display the current block below menu items.

link_title.label: Menu item name
link_title.info: Paste a parent link name to display the current block below menu items.

text.label: Text
text.info: Leave the field blank to hide the text.

image_overlay_background_color.info: Applies only if gradiend option is not set

adapt_height_first_image.label: Adapt section height to first image size
adapt_height_first_image.info: Overwrites image banner height setting when checked.

layout.label: Desktop layout
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

paragraph.content: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)

image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)
